  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public String addUser(String name, String id, int userType)
      Adds a new user to the company's user list.
      pre:
      Parameter "userType" must be an integer value between 1 and 2.
      post:
      A new user is added to the company's user list.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      id - The identification of the user.
      userType - The type of user (1:REGULAR USER, 2: PREMIUM USER).
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the user addition.

    • addProduct

      public String addProduct(String id, String name, int pagesNum, Calendar publicationDate, String url, double saleValue, String review, int genreOpt)
      Adds a new book to the company's product list.
      pre:
      Parameter "genreOpt" must be an integer value between 1 and 3.
      post:
      A new book is added to the company's product list.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the book.
      name - The name of the book.
      pagesNum - The pages number of the book.
      publicationDate - The publication date of the book.
      url - The URL of the repository with the book cover.
      saleValue - The sale value of the book.
      review - The review of the book.
      genreOpt - The book genre option (1:SCI-FI, 2:FANTASY, 3:HISTORICAL NOVEL).
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the book addition.

    • addProduct

      public String addProduct(String id, String name, int pagesNum, Calendar publicationDate, String url, double subscriptionValue, int issuanceFreqOpt, int categoryOpt)
      Adds a new magazine to the company's product list.
      pre:
      Parameters "issuanceFreqOpt" and "categoryOpt" must be an integer value between 1 and 3.
      post:
      A new magazine is added to the company's product list.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the magazine.
      name - The name of the magazine.
      pagesNum - The pages number of the magazine.
      publicationDate - The publication date of the magazine.
      url - The URL of the repository with the magazine cover.
      subscriptionValue - The subscription value of the magazine.
      issuanceFreqOpt - The magazine issuance frequency option (1:WEEKLY, 2:MONTHLY, 3:YEARLY).
      categoryOpt - The magazine category option (1:VARIETIES, 2:DESIGN, 3:SCIENTIFIC).
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the magazine addition.

    • editProduct

      public String editProduct(String id, String name, int pagesNum, Calendar publicationDate, String url, double value, String review, int genreOpt)
      Edits an existing book in the company's product list.
      pre:
      Parameter "genreOpt" must be an integer value between 1 and 3.
      post:
      The information in the book is updated.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the book to be edited.
      name - The new name of the book.
      pagesNum - The new number of pages of the book.
      publicationDate - The new publication date of the book.
      url - The new URL of the book's cover.
      value - The new sale value of the book.
      review - The new review of the book.
      genreOpt - The new genre option of the book (1:SCI-FI, 2:FANTASY, 3:HISTORICAL NOVEL).
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the book edit.

    • editProduct

      public String editProduct(String id, String name, int pagesNum, Calendar publicationDate, String url, double value, int issuanceFreqOpt, int categoryOpt)
      Edits an existing magazine in the company's product list.
      pre:
      Parameters "issuanceFreqOpt" and "categoryOpt" must be an integer value between 1 and 3.
      post:
      The information in the magazine is updated.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the magazine to be edited.
      name - The new name of the magazine.
      pagesNum - The new number of pages of the magazine.
      publicationDate - The new publication date of the magazine.
      url - The new URL of the magazine's cover.
      value - The new subscription value of the magazine.
      issuanceFreqOpt - The new issuance frequency option of the magazine (1:VARIETIES, 2:DESIGN, 3:SCIENTIFIC).
      categoryOpt - The new category option of the magazine (1:VARIETIES, 2:DESIGN, 3:SCIENTIFIC).
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the magazine edit.

    • deleteProduct

      public String deleteProduct(String id)
      Deletes a product from the company's product list.
      post:
      The product is removed from the company's product list.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the product to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the product deletion.

    • generateObjects

      public String generateObjects()
      Generates objects for testing purposes.
      post:
      The generated objects are added to the corresponding company lists.
      Returns:
      A string message containing the information of the generated objects.

    • buyBook

      public String buyBook(String userId, String bookId)
      Processes the purchase of a book by a user.
      post:
      The book is added to the user's product list or books array and an invoice is created with the transaction information.
      Parameters:
      userId - The identification of the user making the purchase.
      bookId - The identifier of the book being purchased.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the operation and the invoice information generated in case of success.

    • subscribeMagazine

      public String subscribeMagazine(String userId, String magazineId)
      Processes the subscription of a magazine by a user.
      post:
      The magazine is added to the user's product list or magazines array and an invoice is created with the transaction information.
      Parameters:
      userId - The identification of the user subscribing to the magazine.
      magazineId - The identifier of the magazine being subscribed to.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the operation and the invoice information generated in case of success.

    • unsubscribeMagazine

      public String unsubscribeMagazine(String userId, String magazineId)
      Processes the unsubscription of a magazine by a user.
      post:
      The magazine is removed from the user's product list or magazines array.
      Parameters:
      userId - The identification of the user unsubscribing from the magazine.
      magazineId - The identifier of the magazine being unsubscribed from.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the operation.

    • displayMyLibrary

      public String displayMyLibrary(String userId, int pageNum)
      Displays the library of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The identification of the user whose library is to be displayed.
      pageNum - The page number of the library to be displayed.
      Returns:
      A string message displaying the user's library.

    • simulateReadingSesion

      public String simulateReadingSesion(String userId, String productId, char pageOpt, int page, int pagesCount)
      Simulates a reading session for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The identification of the user.
      productId - The identifier of the product to read.
      pageOpt - The navigation option in the simulation ('S' for next page).
      page - The current page being read.
      pagesCount - The product's page count read.
      Returns:
      A string message simulating the reading session.

    • simulateReadingSesion

      public String simulateReadingSesion(String userId, int xCoord, int yCoord, char pageOpt, int page, int pagesCount)
      Simulates a reading session for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The identification of the user.
      xCoord - The x-coordinate of the product in the library.
      yCoord - The y-coordinate of the product in the library.
      pageOpt - The navigation option in the simulation ('S' for next page).
      page - The current page being read.
      pagesCount - The product's page count read.
      Returns:
      A string message simulating the reading session.

    • getPagesReadPerProductType

      public String getPagesReadPerProductType()
      Retrieves the total number of pages read per bibliographic product type.
      Returns:
      A string listing the pages read per product type.

    • getGenreAndCategoryMostRead

      public String getGenreAndCategoryMostRead()
      Retrieves the most read genre and category based on the accumulated page counts of products.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the most read genre and category, along with the corresponding page counts.

    • getTop5MostReadProductsPerType

      public String getTop5MostReadProductsPerType()
      Retrieves the top 5 most read products per type (books and magazines).
      Returns:
      A string indicating the top 5 most read books and magazines.

    • getSoldNumAndTotalPaidPerGenre

      public String getSoldNumAndTotalPaidPerGenre()
      Retrieves the number of books sold and the total amount paid per genre.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the number of books sold and the total sales value per genre.

    • getActSubsAndTotalPaidPerCategory

      public String getActSubsAndTotalPaidPerCategory()
      Retrieves the number of active subscriptions and the total amount paid in subscriptions per magazine category.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the number of active subscriptions and the total amount paid in subscriptions per magazine category.

    • showProductList

      public String showProductList()
      Retrieves the company's current product list.
      Returns:
      a message containing the company's current product list.
